label: cascading_failure_01_dx_dns_migration_014
content:
## 2026-01-16 Daily Operations Summary

### Endpoint Performance
- /zone-transfers: REQUESTS req | p50: 760ms p95: 1950ms p99: N/A | err: 6.7% (2 errors) | success: 93.3%
- /axfr-requests: REQUESTS req | p50: 760ms p95: 1950ms p99: N/A | err: 6.7% (2 errors) | success: 93.3%
- /ixfr-requests: REQUESTS req | p50: 760ms p95: 1950ms p99: N/A | err: 2.1% (4 errors) | success: 97.9%
- /ttl-changes: REQUESTS req | p50: 1800s p95: N/A p99: N/A | err: 0% | success: 100%
- /propagation: REQUESTS req | p50: 98ms p95: 275ms p99: N/A | err: 0% | success: 100%
- /dns-queries: QPS avg: 22800 | QPS peak: 55200 | NX domain: 2.3% | Servfail: 0.13% | UDP: 95.7% | TCP fallback: 2.1%
- /dnssec-signing: ZONES signed: 70 | signing queue depth: 4 | signature refreshes: 140 | ds_mismatch: 0 | bogus validation events: 5
- /health-checks: authoritative reachability: 99.94% | SOA serial mismatch: 4 | lame delegation: 1
- /change-mgmt: change requests: 5 | applied: 4 | failed: 1 | mean apply time: 37 min
- /cache-behavior: resolver cache hit: 86.0% | negative cache hit: 44.2% | prefetch enabled: 76.0%
- /latency: auth response avg: 22.6ms | auth response p95: 61.4ms | EDNS0 present: 72%
- /errors: format errors: 18 | refused: 39 | rate limited: 28 | truncation TC: 1.2%
- /capacity: zones: 608 | records: 2,157,600 | dynamic updates/hr: 390
- /compliance: zonefile lint errors: 8 | dnssec policy violations: 1 | audit log gaps: 0

### Infrastructure
- bind-master-01: CPU 52% | Mem 70% | Disk 76% | Conns: 1492 | Net: 126/172 Mbps
- bind-slave-02: CPU 40% | Mem 62% | Disk 57% | Conns: 1368 | Net: 105/120 Mbps
- cloud-dns-sync-01: CPU 78% | Mem 83% | Disk 52% | Conns: N/A | Net: 155/198 Mbps | Queue depth: 14
- signer-01: CPU 60% | Mem 84% | Disk 62% | Conns: N/A | Net: 26/30 Mbps | HSM slot utilization: 69%

### Connection Pools
- pool-name: active 0 | idle 0 | waiting 0 | exhaustion: 0 | max: N/A | avg_wait: N/A

### CDN & Caching
- Hit rate: 86.0% | Bandwidth: N/A | Origin requests: N/A

### Alerts
- [WARNING] TSIG failures on zones: 2
- [INFO] Propagation delays increased after bulk TXT update
- [ERROR] Mismatched TSIG key secret in sync controller
- [ERROR] Record-set size limit exceeded for IaC change
- [WARNING] Lame delegation detected for subzone

### Deployments & Changes
- Rotated and redeployed TSIG secret store entry after failures
- Split record sets for large TXT entries and re-applied
- Corrected parent NS set after lame delegation detection

### Events
- Propagation delays increased after a large bulk TXT update (DKIM keys) across 6 zones; queue depth rose and stale answer sampling hit 1.2%
- TSIG failures reappeared for two zones; discovered mismatched TSIG key secret due to stale secret in sync controller; rotated and redeployed secret store entry
- One IaC change failed due to exceeding provider record-set size limits for aggregated TXT entries; split records and re-applied successfully
- Detected lame delegation for one subzone after registrar glue update; corrected parent NS set and confirmed authoritative reachability

### On-Call
- shift: N. Brooks. 4 pages. 10 tickets. Status: Degraded during bulk TXT change; restored normal after secret rotation and record-set refactor
